title: Mac Client bugs out and turns off computer (Multiple times) (Constant bugs)
body:
Just wanting to bring to your attention, that on multiple occasions in the last two weeks my league client, when in champ select bugs out and turns off my entire computer. This is unacceptable and has caused me to lose LP and rank series. Its becoming increasingly worrying. On top of this I have found that the mac client bugs out and goes white screen and constantly tries to update it self. 

I was just in a champ select for a ranks game and after I managed to get back into the screen (after it shut down) before it was my turn to select, the champs wouldn't come up for me to select. Completely blank. WTF RIOT. I've put a decent amount of money and time into this, and this is what I get out of it. Constant shut downs and bugs.

SPECS on the brief:

macOS Sierra - Version 10.12.4
13-inch, Early 2017
2.7 GHz Intel Core i5

Please can you explain yourself and provide some fixes.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds odd that your entire system is powering down, it's possible your computer may be overheating.

I'm not too familiar with mac OS, however could you please download the "[Intel Power Gadget](https://software.intel.com/en-us/articles/intel-power-gadget-20)" software and monitor your system temperatures at idle and while running league, reply back with what you find.
